cause.description:
In the 70's, many drum corps' in DCI created the foundation for DCI today, and then folded due to money problems. This it to revive those corps' and bring back the older traditions that made drum corps what it is.
1. Keep America's Marching Major League Alive!
2. Create World Peace Through Music.
3. Revive The Actually Entertaining Drum Corps...
cause.mission: Revive Former DCI Corps (as Alumni or full out DCI)
cause.name: Save Our Drum Corps'
